nodes.text: Escara Frei was a Human female that lived on the desert world Tatooine during the Galactic Civil War.

In 1 ABY, she was caught in a firefight between Lady Valarian's guards and Jabba the Hutt's thugs in Mos Eisley. Frei was hit by one or more shots, but her injuries weren't severe. A medic, sent by the 2-1B droid Billingsly to help the local medical staff, treated her wounds. Frei suggested that the medic may contact her friend Captain Jasha in Bestine to work for the Empire.

Escara Frei was a Non-Player Character (NPC) in Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. She could be found near the starport and medical center in Mos Eisley. She was part of the low-level quest Caught in the Crossfire for players of the Medic profession. The player was contacted by Billingsly and needed to talk to Frei to treat her wounds.
